name: Investigate the Mines
dialogue: We've heard strange noises coming from the kobold mines beneath their camps. I need you to investigate. Find Guard Thomas who patrols near the mine entrance and report what you find.
completionDialogue: You made it to the mines! That's good scouting work. Now we know the kobolds are digging deep. Be careful down there.
questDialogue: The mines are definitely active. Those kobolds are up to something. You should report back to the Marshal.
